body_html: I am continuing to get timing numbers for the CPU fuser, but these initial fixes are going to be necessary regardless. I tried -fopenmp, but I noticed that it did not vectorize code when it was enabled, so I have left it out of this PR while I figure out how to debug why it does not vectorize inside an OpenMP loop.
body_text: I am continuing to get timing numbers for the CPU fuser, but these initial fixes are going to be necessary regardless. I tried -fopenmp, but I noticed that it did not vectorize code when it was enabled, so I have left it out of this PR while I figure out how to debug why it does not vectorize inside an OpenMP loop.
body: I am continuing to get timing numbers for the CPU fuser, but these initial fixes are going to be necessary regardless. I tried -fopenmp, but I noticed that it did not vectorize code when it was enabled, so I have left it out of this PR while I figure out how to debug why it does not vectorize inside an OpenMP loop.
